item.title: Seaching For Fun With fd
item.description: fd is a blazing fast (I know, I know ðŸ˜‰) replacement for the in-built find command. I’ve been having a lot of fun incorporating it as part of my workflow so figured out I should at least blog about its basics. The official readme details out all the possible flags/options for using the tool but I’ve reiterated them here for my personal quick reference, to internalise the syntax and with the hope that someone else might find it useful.
